title: Standoff | The Order and Women in White Power
description:
Sociologist James Aho offers more on the The Order, a white supremacist group that went on a violent crime spree in the 1980s, and historian Kathleen Belew describes the role women played within white power movements.
To join Slate Plus, sign up at slate.com/standoff.
